text_it: Ogni 2 settimane effettuiamo donazioni on‑chain a canili e allevamenti etici per supportare i golden retriever. 1% inviato subito al wallet Charity e 4% in streaming 36 mesi, con report pubblici.
text_en: Every 2 weeks we make on‑chain donations to shelters and ethical breeders to support golden retrievers. 1% sent immediately to the Charity wallet and 4% streamed over 36 months, with public reports.
